hero.title: Wedding RSVPs Made
hero.description: Send beautiful invitations via WhatsApp & SMS, track guest responses in real-time, and manage your wedding guest list with ease. No more spreadsheet chaos.

bento.secureDescription: Your guest data is encrypted and never shared. GDPR compliant with secure data handling.
bento.instantDescription: WhatsApp & SMS invitations delivered instantly. No more waiting for postal mail or email opens.
bento.realtimeDescription: Watch responses come in live. Know your guest count at any moment with up-to-date stats.
bento.smartGuestDescription: Organize by family, side, or custom groups. Everyone in one beautiful, sortable list.

features.label: Features
features.title: Discover all features.
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your wedding RSVPs effortlessly.

whatsappInvitations.title: WhatsApp Invitations
whatsappInvitations.description: Send personalized wedding invitations directly to WhatsApp. Higher open rates than email.

smsMessaging.title: SMS Messaging
smsMessaging.description: Reach guests without WhatsApp via SMS. Perfect for older family members.

customRsvpPages.title: Custom RSVP Pages
customRsvpPages.description: Beautiful, branded RSVP pages with your colors, fonts, and wedding details.

guestManagement.title: Guest Management
guestManagement.description: Organize guests by family, side (bride/groom), and groups. Import from Excel.

realtimeDashboard.title: Real-time Dashboard
realtimeDashboard.description: Track RSVPs in real-time. See confirmed, declined, and pending responses at a glance.

smartAnalytics.title: Smart Analytics
smartAnalytics.description: Know exactly how many guests are coming, dietary requirements, and more.

section1.title: Streamline Your Wedding Planning
section1.description: Go Approval takes the stress out of managing wedding RSVPs. From sending invitations to tracking responses, everything is handled in one beautiful dashboard.
section1.item1Description: Send invitations through channels your guests actually use.
section1.item2Description: See who's coming, who's not, and who hasn't responded yet.
section1.item3Description: Customizable RSVP pages that match your wedding style.

section2.title: Everything You Need in One Place
section2.description: Import your guest list, customize your messages, and let Go Approval handle the rest. Track responses, send reminders, and export reports effortlessly.
section2.item1Description: Import guests from Excel or add them manually in seconds.
section2.item2Description: Automatic reminders to guests who haven't responded.
section2.item3Description: Export guest lists and dietary requirements for your venue.

testimonials.label: Testimonials
testimonials.title: What our clients are sharing.
testimonials.subtitle: Discover the glowing feedback from our delighted customers worldwide.

review1.name: Sarah & David
review1.review: Go Approval saved us so much time! We had 300 guests and tracking RSVPs was a nightmare before. The WhatsApp integration is genius - everyone responded within days.

review2.name: Rachel Cohen
review2.review: As a mom helping plan my daughter's wedding, I was worried about the technology. But Go Approval is so easy to use. Even my husband figured it out!

review3.name: Michael & Noa
review3.review: The automatic reminders feature is amazing. We didn't have to chase anyone - the system did it for us. Highly recommend for busy couples.

review4.name: Yael Levi
review4.review: I recommend Go Approval to all my clients now. It's professional, reliable, and makes my job so much easier. The reporting features are excellent.

review5.name: Daniel & Maya
review5.review: We loved being able to customize our RSVP page to match our wedding theme. The preview feature helped us get it perfect before sending.

review6.name: Amit Shapira
review6.review: Couples who use Go Approval always have accurate guest counts. The export feature makes our catering planning seamless. Great product!

review7.name: Shira & Oren
review7.review: Managing RSVPs for our wedding of 400 guests was effortless with Go Approval. The SMS feature was perfect for reaching our grandparents.

pricing.label: Pricing
pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.happyToHelp: and we'll be happy to help.

compare.label: Plans
compare.title: Compare Our Plans
compare.subtitle: Find the perfect plan tailored for your business needs!

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Explore our comprehensive FAQ to find quick answers to common inquiries. If you need further assistance, don't hesitate to contact us for personalized help.

item1.question: How does Go Approval work?
item1.answer: Simply upload your guest list, customize your invitation message, and send via WhatsApp or SMS. Guests click a personalized link to RSVP, and you track responses in real-time on your dashboard.

item2.question: Is the Starter plan really free?
item2.answer: Yes! The Starter plan is completely free and includes up to 100 guests, WhatsApp & SMS invitations, and basic RSVP tracking. Perfect for intimate celebrations.

item3.question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
item3.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade from Starter to Pro or Business at any time. Your existing data and guest responses will be preserved.

item4.question: How are WhatsApp messages sent?
item4.answer: We use the official WhatsApp Business API to send your invitations. Messages are delivered instantly and appear as regular WhatsApp messages to your guests.

item5.question: What happens if a guest doesn't have WhatsApp?
item5.answer: No problem! You can send SMS invitations to guests who don't use WhatsApp. Our system lets you choose the best channel for each guest.

item6.question: Is my guest data secure?
item6.answer: Yes, we take security seriously. All data is encrypted, stored securely, and never shared with third parties. We're fully GDPR compliant.
